Text: Re DeAceropst Louise Attached is an excel file that contains the following Summary a table of what we believe DeAcero could expect to save at different gas prices A list of advantages and risks of entering into the import deal If you have any questions please do not hesitate to give me a call Thanks Marc Louise nronXgate AM To Marc NRON cc Subject DeAcero I would like to see the information you set out to David on why he should sign the PPA This is purely for me to gain a better understanding of the thought process in Mexico Please could you email it to me Thanks Louise Louise Kitchen Chief Operating Officer Enron Americas Tel Fax
